pages.name: Siren
pages.text: $(#734608)$(thing)Sirens$()$(#734608) appear to be beautiful women with the tails of a fish at first glance.

$(#734608)Sirens lie on top of small outcroppings in the ocean in groups of two or more. They have been known to lure unsuspecting sailors in with their beautiful singing$(br2) Once their prey is close enough, the $(thing)sirens$()$(#734608) will convert to their horrific naga forms and tear its prey apart with their razor sharp teeth and claws
$(#734608)One can protect themselves from siren by wearing earplugs which will render the user immune to the siren's song

$(#734608)Sirens will drop prismarine shards, prismarine crystals, $(item)shiny scales$()$(#734608), and rarely a $(item)siren tear$()$(#734608) upon death$(br2)Shiny scales can be brewed into potions of water breathing, forged into $(item)tide guardian armor$()$(#734608), or crafted into a $(item)siren flute$()

pages.text_left: $(#734608)A powerful flute able to render targets infatuated and unable to attack for 10 seconds
